title: How to Get the IKELOS SMG in Destiny 2: Exotic Missions Rotator & Xur

steps.title: Use the Exotic Mission Rotator to replay Operation Seraph's Shield.
steps.content: Use the Exotic Mission Rotator to replay Operation Seraph's Shield. The Exotic Mission Rotator is a new feature added in Season 22 that allows you to play old Exotic missions. The only prerequisite is that you must own the expansion or season associated with that mission. To play Operation: Seraph's Shield, you must own The Witch Queen. It was part of Season of the Seraph. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select Operation Seraph's Shield when it's available.
steps.content: Select Operation Seraph's Shield when it's available. As of right now, Bungie has announced the schedule for the first three months of rotating Exotic Missions. Operation: Seraph's Shield will be available on the following dates: December 19, 2023 January 9, 2024 January 30, 2024 February 20, 2024

steps.title: Complete the mission for a chance to get the IKELOS SMG.
steps.content: Complete the mission for a chance to get the IKELOS SMG. If you complete the mission on regular difficulty, legend difficulty, and two runs on any difficulty, you are guaranteed three red border drops. Additional completions will still give rewards, but they're not guaranteed to be red borders.

steps.title: Check Xur's shop.
steps.content: Check Xur's shop. From time to time, Xur will sell the IKELOS SMG in his shop. Xur is a vendor that sells Legendary and Exotic items, but can only be found on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. He also appears in a random location in the public sectors of the European Dead Zone, Titan, Io, and Nessus, or in the Tower. [2] X Research source Xur sells items for Legendary Shards. To easily check what Xur is selling and where he's located for the week, you can use the website whereisxur.com .
